solution_line_template: A pound of cream cheese cost ${cheddar_price} / {half_price_divisor} = ${<<{cheddar_price}/{half_price_divisor}={cream_cheese_cost}>>}{cream_cheese_cost}.
A pack of cold cuts cost ${cheddar_price} x {twice_price_multiplier} = ${<<{cheddar_price}*{twice_price_multiplier}={cold_cuts_cost}>>}{cold_cuts_cost}.
